venue.address_1: RT103 Child St. and Railroad Av.
venue.name: East bay Bike Path

item.description: CANCELLED! CANCELLED! CANCELLED! Hi All, I emailed last night this was on, but weather channel this morning predicts cold, maybe snow or rain, so this is CANCELLED! I am reshedulig for April 14th same time, update to follow. So sorry, I was really looking to meet all the awesome people in this group, anyone interested in hosting a meetup let me know and we'll shedule it. Please tell your freinds if there not members of this group that this has been cancelled. Heidi and Kendra you guys can sleep in!! Bye, Rich
item.name: Bike Ride CANCELLED! WARREN TO BRISTOL MAR. 31st.
